评论详情: Great design, good shade of gold, and the size of the charm is just right! I’m pointing that out because a lot of the flower of life necklaces I’ve seen are either too big or when they’re small, the pattern would barely be visible. I took off one star because the necklace I received came with a scratch, and the material of the charm itself looks like it will scratch easily. With that being said, I think it makes a nice gift and it arrived with great packaging. I’m excited to wear this necklace with my other gold necklaces!
